text: Aur woh aisa hai kay apni baaraan-e-rehmat say pehlay hawaon ko bhejta hai kay woh khush ker deti hain yahan tak kay woh hawayen jab badlon ko utha leti hain to hum iss badal ko kissi khushk sir zamin ki taraf haank ley jatay hain phir iss badal say pani barsatay hain phir iss pani say her qisam kay phal nikaltay hain. Yun hi hum murdon ko nikal khara keren gay takay tum samjho
